          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light ray reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion des hellen Strahls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion de rayon léger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão do raio claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione del raggio luminoso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση ελαφριών ακτίνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión del rayo ligero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an incident light ray striking the surface of a mirror. The locations of the incidence and reflected angles are indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Ereignis den hellen 
Strahl, der die Oberfläche eines Spiegels anschlägt. Die 
Standorte der Ausdehnung und die reflektierten Winkel werden 
angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à un incident le rayon 
léger heurtant la surface d'un miroir. Les emplacements de 
l'incidence et des angles reflétés sont indiqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a um incident o raio 
claro que golpeia a superfície de um espelho. As posições da 
incidência e os ângulos refletidos são indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un avvenimento il 
raggio luminoso che colpisce la superficie di uno specchio. Le 
posizioni dell'incidenza e gli angoli riflessi sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συναφή ελαφριά ακτίνα 
που χτυπά την επιφάνεια ενός καθρέφτη. Οι θέσεις της 
επίπτωσης και οι απεικονισμένες γωνίες είναι υποδειγμένες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a incidente el rayo 
ligero pulso la superficie de un espejo. Las localizaciones de 
la incidencia y los ángulos reflejados se indican.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reflektierter Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
